long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Step into the world of futuristic intrigue and mechanical marvels with Robot Escape, a thrilling puzzle adventure game that will put your problem-solving skills to the test. As a sentient robot trapped in a labyrinthine facility, you must navigate through a series of challenging levels, overcome obstacles, and outsmart your captors to secure your freedom.

In Robot Escape, players find themselves in a high-tech facility filled with puzzles, traps, and security systems designed to thwart any escape attempt. As you progress through each level, you'll encounter increasingly complex challenges that require quick thinking, strategic planning, and precise execution to overcome.
